document_data.name: Cloak of Balduran
document_data.mainbody: The '''''cloak of Balduran''''' was an [[Item enchantment|magical]] [[cloak]] that was worn by the famous explorer, and [[Baldur's Gate|city]]-founder [[Balduran]].
document_data.Powers: The cloak provided the wearer with significant protections, even shielding them from [[magic]]al [[spell]]s and spell-like abilities.
document_data.History: Sometime around the [[1368 DR|Year of the Banner, 1368 DR]], Balduran's cloak and [[helm of Balduran|helm]] were recovered by the [[elven]] [[adventurer]] [[Vail]] who was subsequently ''[[flesh to stone|turned to stone]]'' by the Baldurian [[wizard]] [[Ramazith Flamesinger]]. However, before Vail and his companions were petrified and sold to the art collector [[Felonius Gist]], the adventure hid the helmet and gave the cloak away to the courtesan [[Quenash]].
